title: Swan Song
description: Katrina Collins isn’t like other musicians.She doesn’t grant interviews. She doesn’t pander to the people. No one has ever seen her outside of her musical arena. Lewis Morrison isn’t like other music journalists.He despises music. He loathes musicians. No one can stand to be in his company for more than a few moments.Katrina and Lewis are damaged.In the seedy underbelly of Camden Town, North London’s most unique habitat, they will find each other, and their discovery will bring hope, redemption, pain, pleasure......and death.This is Swan Song.And this is not like other vampire stories.
author: Jevron McCrory
